articles.title: Site Selection
articles.description: A new article created using the Distill format.
articles.contents:
Heading 1
This is a placeholder for site selection
Creating Proximity Maps
Importing Necessary Data
We need to ensure that the data which we are utilising, is in a raster format, and we need to clip out unnecessary points.
For all layers:
For the selected layer, go to Vector > Geoprocessing > Clip, and select the study area Final_shape as the overlay layer, and the input layer as desired (for example, for airports, it will be AIRPORT_PT_50K). After creating, a temporary layer Clipped should be produced.
